
### Chord progressions generated by different models given the same melody

### Example 1

<div style="text-align: center">
<table>
    <tr>
        <td>BLSTM</td> 
        <td>CLSTM</td> 
        <td>DQN</td> 
   </tr>
    <tr>
  		<td>

        </midi-player>
        </div>
        </td> 
        <td>
